name: Kanniyakumari Sea Side Park
description: Kanyakumari Sea Side Park is a picturesque waterfront park located in Kanyakumari, Tamil Nadu, India. It offers stunning views of the Arabian Sea and is renowned for its relaxing ambiance and scenic beauty. The park features well-maintained gardens, walking paths, seating areas, and viewpoints perfect for watching mesmerizing sunsets over the sea. Visitors can enjoy a peaceful atmosphere while soaking in the coastal breeze and the natural beauty of this southernmost coastal town in India.
location: 3GHX+G5V, Kovalam Beach Rd, Kanniyakumari, Tamil Nadu 629702
